org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class UiElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hoverable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedImage, Checkbox, Image, Label, ParentUiElement, ProgressBar, RadioButton, Select, Slider, TextBox

    public abstract class UiElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hoverable
    Base class for all user interface elements

      • setZIndex

        public abstract void setZIndex(int zIndex)
        Sets the Z index of this UiElement. Elements will be rendered on different Z layers in ascending Z order (negatives values first, positive values last)
        Parameters:
        zIndex - The Z index

      • getElementById

        public UiElement getElementById(java.lang.String id)
        Searches the UI for a UiElement with a given id. Warning: This can be an expensive operation for complex UIs. It is recommended you cache results.
        Parameters:
        id - The UiElement identifier to search for
        Returns:
        Null if there is no such UiElement with the given id
